text.text: Make various copies of a list for multiple reasons. Mumara makes it easy to duplicate or triplicate a contact list by using the “make a copy” feature. Create as many copies as required.
Use the “Dedupe List” feature in order to delete contacts from the selected or other than selected list, that are matching in various lists.
Refresh the list by using **“Re-count Subscribers”** option
Make Mumara refresh the contact list after any contact is added to or deleted from it by using the feature “Re-count Subscribers”.
